data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64, Discord 4.10 (505) Zenfone 5 Android 5.0
data.actual_result: In the android app, you will not be permitted to do so but in Discord desktop, you are able to.
data.expected_result: You would not be allowed to modify their roles
data.short_description: Managing roles of members whose highest role is same as yours is not permitted in Android Stable/Alpha but possible in desktop
data.steps_to_repro: - On the desktop/android app and in a Discord server which you have Manage Roles permission, go to Server Settings - Under User Management, go to Members - Tap on a member whose highest role is the same as yours
